function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of UV-C radiation at disinfecting transported air in central air handling units","Impact":"Increased risk of pathogen transmission through the air","Mitigation":"Implementing additional air disinfection measures alongside UV-C radiation","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, photocatalytic oxidation systems","People":"Building occupants, especially in shared spaces","Owner":"Building management, HVAC professionals"},{"Description":"Ozone production as a by-product of UV-C radiation","Impact":"Harmful health effects due to accumulation of ozone in indoor areas","Mitigation":"Use of glass that absorbs UV-C radiation of 185 nm for air disinfection lamps","Technologies":"Germicidal fluorescent lamps with glass filters","People":"Building occupants, especially in shared spaces","Owner":"Building management, HVAC professionals"},{"Description":"Health risks from direct exposure to UV-C radiation","Impact":"Skin and eye damage, material degradation","Mitigation":"Avoiding direct exposure of humans and sensitive materials to UV-C radiation","Technologies":"Safety protocols, UV shields, protective barriers","People":"Building occupants, HVAC technicians","Owner":"Building management, HVAC professionals"}]}
